## Type of Change

## Pattern Checklist (for new patterns)
- [ ] Vulnerable program implemented with `// VULNERABILITY:` comments
- [ ] Secure program implemented with `// SECURITY:` comments
- [ ] Exploit demonstration tests written
- [ ] Security verification tests written
- [ ] Pattern README.md completed
- [ ] All tests pass locally

## General Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (`cargo fmt`, `cargo clippy`)
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
- [ ] Tests added/updated as needed
